= Package Dependencies =
*blaisemath* projects use [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apache_Maven Apache maven] build files, which specify dependencies required to build the projects. Netbeans and Eclipse can load maven projects directly, and automatically download dependencies from the central maven repository. Currently, most projects use [https://code.google.com/p/guava-libraries/ Google Guava], and the BlaiseGraphTheory project also uses [http://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-math/ Apache commons math]. The remaining project dependencies are on other blaise libraries, or on [https://code.google.com/p/javafirestorm/ Firestarter].
